## An ode to being a really forgetful person

My bookmarks bar and folder of saved Tweets are graveyards full of wonderful resources that I have promised myself I'd return to at a later time and never did. Here, I've compiled and organized a list of some of these links for easy access! Out of sight, out of mind, right?
